description: nothing goes with anything elese just a time waister nothing fits no point to this game.
can't reduce volume, so it drowns any other music or videos playing at the same time..

a very good alternative for AMOGUS very fun and funny but full of bugs.
is this open source?
anyways good alternatives for our linux gamers

Nice little game; has a few false leads but doesn't let you paint yourself into a situation you can't get out of.

The only "bugs" I encountered were the screen size not being resizeable (looks tiny on a 4K monitor), some of the icons changing slightly as mouseovers, and the active point on some of the icons being further to the right than I expected.

Could easily be the first chapter in a longer and more involved game.
you get to a certain point then nothing you can do to move on, no point to this game.
Nettes click-and-point Abenteuer. Macht Spaß, ist nur etwas zu schnell zu Ende. Nach 'ner Stunde war ich fertig.
